Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. Given its quality and features, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $100. Considering the unique benefits it offers, I'm proposing a special introductory price of $125 for you. This opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
